Vulkan SDK for Windows Release Notes

Vulkan SDK 1.1.77.0 Release Notes

Version 1.1.77.0 for Windows
June 20, 2018

This SDK supports Vulkan API revision 1.1.77. The prior SDK supported Vulkan API revision 1.1.73.

Drivers: LunarG recommends that you update your Vulkan-capable hardware drivers to the latest recommended version from your hardware vendor. A list of Known Driver Issues appears at the end of this document with more information.

Overview of new features in SDK 1.1.77

  • Many bug fixes, increased validation coverage and accuracy improvements, and feature additions

  • The following extensions are new for this SDK release:

     VK_KHR_get_display_properties2
 VK_KHR_draw_indirect_count

A Note on Valid Usage IDs

The standard Khronos validation layers have been migrated to use the canonical Vulkan VUID values, which are strings in the form of "VUID-vkCmdBlitImage-filter-00236". In doing so, the old integer-based enumerated values are being phased out. In the next SDK release they will no longer be returned by log_msg() calls. Developers keying on these returned values for their development should use the map in the vk_validation_error_messages.h file to obtain the matching Vulkan VUIDs when perform their updates.

SDK Components

This version of the SDK is based on the following specifications, source code repositories, commits, and issue resolutions:

  • Vulkan Specification including extensions
  • Github Repo: Vulkan Loader, Version Tag: sdk-1.1.77.0, Fixed Github Issues, Known Issues
  • Github Repo: Vulkan Validation Layers,Version Tag: sdk-1.1.77.0, Fixed Github Issues, Known Issues
  • Github Repo: Khronos Vulkan Tools, Version Tag: sdk-1.1.77.0, Fixed Github Issues, Known Issues
  • SPIR-V Specification version 1.3
  • Github Repo: Glslang library and tools
  • Github Repo: LunarG Vulkan Tools, Version Tag: sdk-1.1.77.0, Fixed Github Issues, Known Issues
  • Github Repo: Vulkan Samples, Version Tag: sdk-1.1.77.0, Fixed Github Issues, Known Issues

Known Driver Issues

None
